name: Bad Scary Teacher
description:
A new horror adventure series of a kid and a high school bad scary teacher. Once there was a kid, while taking his class, he took a nap but when he woke up He found out that the high school has converted into a haunted and horror high school and his good teacher was also converted into a bad scary teacher and now that scary teacher is after him and he has to escape the horror high school building before the high school's bad scary teacher
catches him.
